name: Bounce racing car
description:
Bounce racing car is a sideboard jump racing game with simple controls and challenging enemy chases.

The story of the game is in the future world. One day, the nano-robots collectively launched a rebellion, and you escaped from the future technology company. You will drive the super magnetic jumping cool racing car of the future technology company and try your best to escape the pursuit of the large nano-robots.

There are 3 racing cars to choose from, corresponding to 3 different levels, choose a racing car that suits you and start racing!
Purple racing car: Star yao ares, the streamlined body lines and the low body show the identity of high-tech racing cars everywhere.
White racing car: The god of the mackey, the front face adopts an air diversion design, and the front cover has a channel that flows through the air intake grille, which reduces wind resistance, increases grip, and makes it faster.
Red racing car: The purgatory Lord, the front and rear of the vehicle are equipped with high-frequency frequency spikes. The only pity is that this is useless for the large nano-robots behind.

How to play: Press the space bar and the vehicle will activate the built-in super magnetic system and bounce over obstacles.
